verlanos.social.crow

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • verlanos.social.crow.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is fully responsible for interacting with a DBM used to store and retrieve Users. MapDB is used to store User instances in serialised form for easy storage and retrieval, while maintaining persistence. There will always be only one Database instance.
    Since:
    05/08/2014
    Author:
    Sefverl Balasingam

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Database getInstance()

      • open

        public void open()
        Connects to the default MapDB database

        This method connects to a database and creates a handle for retrieval and storage. It connects to the default database and table.

      • open

        public void open(java.lang.String filename,
        java.lang.String recordName)
        Connects to a MapDB database

        This method connects to a database and creates a handle for retrieval and storage.

        Parameters:
        filename - path to the MapDB database file. If the file doesn't exist, a database file will be generated.
        recordName - name of the collection/table to open

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String username)
        Returns a User with the specified username NOTE:

        Requires a prior call to open()

        Parameters:
        username - username of User to retrieve
        Returns:
        User if found, otherwise User.EMPTY_USER

      • getUsers

        public java.util.List<User> getUsers(java.lang.String... usernames)
        Returns a list of Users with the specified usernames.

        This method uses @see getUser() to retrieve each User. The list may contain User.EMPTY_USER if a username doesn't exist

        NOTE:

        Requires a prior call to open()

        Parameters:
        usernames - one or more usernames
        Returns:
        list of User instances.

      • getAllUsers

        public java.util.Collection<User> getAllUsers()
        Returns a Collection of all Users NOTE:

        Requires a prior call to open()

        Returns:
        a Collection of Users

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage(java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String message)

      • addFollowee

        public void addFollowee(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String followee)
        Adds a User with given username to the list of followed User's of specified User NOTE:

        Requires a prior call to open()

        Parameters:
        username - username of the User who likes to follow
        followee - username of User to be followed

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the active database session NOTE:

        Requires a prior call to open()

      • deleteDB

        public void deleteDB(java.lang.String collection_name)
        Deletes a MapDB collection NOTE:

        Requires a prior call to open()

        Parameters:
        collection_name - name of the collection to be deleted
